t: Amazon.com, Inc. - News release
Karen Inglis ~ Children's Books – Well Said Press
s: I’m Karen Inglis - welcome to my author website! Whether you’re a young reader, a parent, a school or a bookseller I hope you’ll enjoy looking around! I live in Barnes, South-West London with my husband. We have two sons who are working and also living in London.

t: Karoline Leavitt’s Angry New Attack on Amazon Reveals Trump’s Weakness | The New Republic
s: April 29, 2025 - OK, so Amazon backed down on posting the cost of Trump’s tariffs. But the wildly disproportionate attack on the company from the White House press secretary actually exposed Trump’s deep vulnerabilities.

t: Amazon Press Release Template - Google Docs
s: Amazon famously writes the press release for a new product or feature before a line of code is written to develop it. The reason is two-fold. First, it forces the company to be clear about the benefits the product will provide to the customer. Second, it’s easier to iterate on the press release ...
